string.name: name
string.value: Decent Advanced Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, Max HP, and Max MP. Reduces the amount of MP used when using skills. Can be stacked with other buff skills except for Advanced Blessing.

string.name: name
string.value: Final Pact

string.name: desc
string.value: #cWhen HP reaches 0,# your dark contract keeps you alive for a short time and #callows you to use Gungnir's Descent without any cooldown while invincible#. However, you must eliminate the required number of monsters before time runs out, or you will be dragged into the Shadow Abyss. The hourglass will be displayed during the reactivation cooldown.\n[Passive Effect: When HP is higher than the limit, Damage, Movement Speed, Critical Rate, and minimum Critical Damage will be increased]

string.name: h
string.value: #cWhen HP reaches 0,# fully restores HP and MP, Invincibility Duration: #time sec, deals damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection, #cIgnores Gungnir's Descent cooldown#. If #z enemies are defeated within Invincibility duration, you revive after the duration ends. If the enemy is a boss, the number of attacks is considered the number of enemy defeats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec\n[Passive Effect: When HP is #x% or above, Damage: +#damage%, Movement Speed: +#psdSpeed, Critical Rate: +#cr%, Minimum Critical Damage: +#criticaldamageMin%]

string.name: name
string.value: Mist Eruption

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Permanently increases Poison Mist's continuous damage. Upon using the skill, nearby Poison Mists explode, dealing fatal damage to enemies. The damage will increase proportional to the number of continuous damage effects applied to the target. You cannot detonate Mists set by others. The damage boost applies up to the 5th effect. If the mist explodes successfully, the cooldown of Flame Haze will reset.\nRequired Skill: #cPoison Mist Lv. 20#

string.name: desc
string.value: Gathers power to form an energy vortex, culminating in a powerful #cHoly# explosion that decreases enemy DEF if the skill is fully charged when cast. DEF reduction effect of Big Bang can be stacked, but not with other skills.

string.name: name
string.value: Mana Reflection

string.name: desc
string.value: By drawing on incredible inner strength, you reverse the Mana flow of a monster, reflecting the damage the monster dealt. The returned damage cannot exceed 20% of Max HP of the monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily summons Bahamut to deal Holy damage. Bahamut can attack multiple enemies at the same, and being attacked by Bahamut will make them extra vulnerable to Holy attacks. This skill is unaffected by enemy damage reflection skills.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Bahamut Summon Duration: #time sec, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemy Hit: #mobCount at once.\nEnemies attacked will be marked with Bahamut's insignia for #subTime seconds, and when they are attacked with a Holy attack, the insignia will disappear and final damage will increase by #x%.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Temporarily summons Bahamut to deal Holy damage. Bahamut can attack multiple enemies at the same time.

string.name: ph

string.name: desc
string.value: Lets you use skills without spending MP and has a chance to trigger Power Stance on hit. Also continually recovers HP and MP, and increases the damage of all attack magic. Enemy attacks will not remove this effect.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Recovers HP and MP by #y% every 4 secs, Increases final damage of Magic ATT by #damage% every 4 sec, Infinity is doubled. Chance of Activating Power Stance Effect: #prop%, Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: 3 min

string.name: name
string.value: Advanced Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: Greatly increases nearby party member ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, Max HP, and Max MP. Reduces MP consumption upon using the skill. Can be stacked with other buff skills, excluding Bless.\nRequired Skill : #cBless Lv. 10 or above#

string.name: desc
string.value: Resurrects a party member using a ray of holy light.

string.name: name
string.value: Angel Ray

string.name: desc
string.value: Attacks with a holy arrow, dealing tremendous holy damage. Very effective against Undead or Devil monsters. #cRestores allies' HP#. Restores Undead allies as well.

string.name: h

string.value: Allows you to hide in the shadows for a short time. While Dark Sight is activated you cannot hit or be hit by enemies, but you can use the Flash Jump skill. The cooldown when Dark Sight is deactivated is affected by damage dodged in proportion to your to Max HP. Press the skill key again to deactivate Dark Sight.

You descend diagonally from the air, slashing enemies within a certain range, with a chance to stun them. To use the skill, you must have at least #c120%# Jump.
Required Skill: #cLv. 20 Self Haste#
Lv.10 effect: Lv.20 Tornado Spin can be used with Lv.10 Bloody Storm
#cLv.6 or above: Mastery Book required#

string.name: name
string.value: Chains of Hell

string.name: desc
string.value: Chains of Hell pulls an enemy close and deals 10 consecutive Critical strikes with a chance to stun. You will be invincible during and for 3 seconds after the attack, and this skill can be used while other skills are being used. Stationary monsters must be in range.

string.name: name
string.value: Barrel Roulette

string.name: desc
string.value: Explodes an Oak Barrel to receive a random buff. When the buff is active, attacking an enemy has a fixed chance of causing abnormal status on them.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, applies a random buff for #time sec.
Lightning: When attacking, additional attack to #y enemies for #x% Damage.
Ice: Critical Max Damage +#s%.
Slow: When attacking, #w% chance of applying Slow Abnormal Status for #v sec to all enemies, including bosses.
Skull: When attacking, continuous damage of #dot% Damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.
#cCooldown #cooltime sec.#
[Passive Effects: Final damage +#pdR%]

string.value: Upgrade the magic of the monkey to increase the HP, MP, all stats, Speed, Jump, Accuracy, and Avoidability of all nearby party members for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with other buffs.\nRequired Skill: #cMonkey Magic Lv. 20#

string.name: name
string.value: Anchors Aweigh

string.name: desc
string.value: Places an anchor that creates a strong magnetic field. The magnetic field pulls enemies toward it. When the anchor disappears, it explodes, dealing critical damage to all nearby enemies. This skill is unaffected by enemy damage reflection skills.

string.name: h

Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.value: Decent Combat Orders

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cSkills that have already reached master level are not increased.# \nExceptions: Beginner skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, and Hyper Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Decent Advanced Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, Max HP, and Max MP. Reduces the amount of MP used when using skills. Can be stacked with other buff skills except for Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, For 240 seconds - Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Weapon DEF +425, Magic DEF +425, Accuracy +260, Avoidability +260, Max HP +475, Max MP +475, MP Consumption: -12%

string.name: name
string.value: Decent Speed Infusion

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Skill Swipe

string.name: desc
string.value: Steals the skills of Explorer characters nearby. Certain skills cannot be stolen, and Bishop's Heal will have its cooldown increased.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Shifts to steal mode upon use\nMove the mouse cursor to select the nearby Explorer character

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to manage skills stolen from other Explorer characters. Use this skill to throw away stolen skills or call them up with Impeccable Memory. Cannot use the skill directly after configuration.

string.name: h
string.value: Manage stolen skills. 30 second cooldown added.

string.name: name
string.value: Judgment Draw

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks with Carte Blanche #u times. Grants one of the following effects:\n#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%\n#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%

string.name: name
string.value: Judgment Draw

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks enemies with Carte Noir #u times. Also grants one of the following effects for #time sec.
#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%
#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%
#cEndurance Card:# Abnormal Status Resistance +#x%, Elemental Resistance +#y%
#cDrain Card:# #z% of Max HP recovered when attacking

string.name: name
string.value: Final Blow

string.name: desc
string.value:
Swing your polearm around to deal massive damage, ignoring some DEF. Learn this skill to utilize Final Blow as the 3rd hit of Smash Swing.
[Command: #cDown + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: renders all enemy attacks ineffective. 
Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Shoots shockwaves in front of you.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Beyond Blade.#
#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Ignored Monster DEF: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nShoots #u shockwaves that attack up to #x enemies with #y% damage #s times during Adrenaline Rush.

string.name: name
string.value: Aero Swing

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to use Smash Swing while airborne. Use Smash Swing while jumping, and Maha will stop you from falling. You'll be able to move around, just like on the ground. Also, passively increase Smash Swing's damage.
[Command: Combo #cAttack Key# while jumping]
#cLevel 10 required to learn Swing Studies II#
Required Skill: #cSwing Studies I Lv. 4#

string.name: h
string.value: Can use Smash Swing while airborne, damage increases by #damPlus% points

string.name: h
string.value: Can use Smash Swing while airborne, damage increases by #damPlus% points

string.name: name
string.value: Judgment Draw

string.name: desc
string.value:
Your polearm slams into the ground with great force, bouncing nearby enemies. Enemies hit directly by the polearm will be frozen and take damage over time. You can control where the polearm lands.
[Command: #cUp, Down/Up, Right/Up, Left + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Freeze
#cRight-click to lock command#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec, Freeze Duration: #time sec

string.name: name
string.value: Beyond Blade

string.name: desc
string.value: Utilizes all of Aran's strength to sweep away enemies with Maha. You're invincible while using Beyond Blade. Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Shoots out shockwaves front and back.\nRequired Skill: #cFinal Blow Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Can deal up to 3 additional hits with further key presses.

2-hit: Attack 5 times with #s% damage
3-hit: Attack 5 times with #u% damage.
Damage increases by #w% for every 1 less target, increased damage is doubled. Critical Rate is #cr% when using the pertinent skill, Ignored Monster DEF: #ignoreMobpdpR%
Shoots a shockwave that attacks up to 6 enemies with 400% damage 5 times.
#cCan be used after Final Blow.

string.name: name

string.name: name
string.value: Finisher - Storm of Fear

string.name: desc
string.value: Pummel your enemies with a series of swings so quick, your polearm becomes invisible. Forms a whirlwind around Aran, sucking in all enemies. This skill can be activated by command only during Adrenaline Rush.\n[Command: #cDown, Left, Right + Attack (held down)#]\nRequired Skill: #cAdrenaline Rush Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Duration: 10 sec\n#cOnly one finisher can be triggered per Adrenaline Rush.

string.name: name
string.value: Finisher - Hunter's Prey

string.name: desc
string.value: Charges forward to strike a powerful blow, automatically targeting the most powerful enemy in the direction of your attack. Charge the skill longer to do more damage. You're invincible while charging. This skill can be activated by command only during Adrenaline Rush.\n[Command: #cDown, Right, Up + Attack Key (held down)#]\nRequired Skill: #cAdrenaline Rush Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, hold key down to charge and use arrow keys to change direction once activated, strikes #attackCount times dealing #damage% to #mobCount monsters, invincible while charging. Damage increases by #s% points for every 1 sec of charging, up to 500% points. Can charge for up to 5 sec.\n#cOnly one finisher can be triggered per Adrenaline Rush.

string.value: Command Mastery II

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Five pentacles of thunder appear and crash into enemies when Mir's #cDragon Flash# melds with Evan's magic. Thunder Flash advances alongside Dragon Flash. You won't take damage when this skill targets enemies with attack reflection. \nActivates when Evan uses #cThunder Circle# while Mir is using #cDragon Flash#.

string.name: name
string.value: Elemental Knights

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons an Ice Spirit, Fire Spirit, or Shadow Spirit to aid you in battle. Elemental Knights do not take damage even if they attack enemies with attack reflection.
Ice Spirit: Has a chance to freeze enemies.
Fire Spirit: Deals continuous fire damage to enemies.
Shadow Spirit: Deals increased damage.

Fire Spirit - Damage Over Time: #v% chance of causing #y% damage every #x sec for #w sec
Shadow Spirit: Damage: #z%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Ishtar's Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Borrows the power of Ishtar, a legendary weapon, to rapidly fire arrows at enemies ahead of you. Hold down the skill key to fire arrows continuously. In addition, damage from Stunning Strikes will be increased permanently.\nRequired Skill: #cStunning Strikes Lv. 20#

string.name: name
string.value: Spikes Royale

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Jump into the air while raining down legendary spears that deal damage to multiple enemies. Enemy DEF will decrease, and all attacks will become critical hits. In addition, damage of Leap Tornado will increase permanently.\nRequired Skill; #cLeap Tornado Lv. 10#

string.name: ph
string.value: Active Effect: MP Cost: #mpCon. Critical Attack - Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Enemy DEF: -#y%, Duration: #time sec\n[Passive Effect: Leaf Tornado Damage: +#damR%]

string.name: desc
string.value: Jump into the air while raining down legendary spears that deal damage to multiple enemies. Decreases enemy DEF, and makes all attacks critical hits. Also increases damage of Leaf Tornado. The skill can be linked with Leaf Tornado, Gust Dive, Rolling Moonsault, or Wrath of Enlil. Cooldown reduced by 1 sec when a Link skill is used.\nRequired Skill; #cLeaf Tornado Lv. 10#

MP Cost: #mpCon. Critical Attack - Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Enemy DEF: -#y%, Duration: #time sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
Cooldown -1 second each time a linked skill is used.
[Passive Effect: Leaf Tornado Damage: +#damR%]

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Splits the souls of non-stationary enemies from their bodies. Applies a debuff to stationary enemies granting +#z% damage to your next attack.
#c[Split Soul]# Creates a stationary mirror image that shares HP with the original target and receives #x% less damage. Duration: #time sec.
+#y% EXP when defeating a Split Soul or the original target.
#c Cooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Bond Max

string.name: desc
string.value: Your bond with the spirits has been maxed. Your yearning for Moonbean summons the spirit guardian you got from her, and it takes her form. The memory of an uneaten liver nibbles away at your subconscious, appearing sometimes when you hit enemies. Pick it up to strengthen your resolve and increase the buff's duration.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time, Damage: +#indieDamR%, Attack Power: +#indiePad, Boss Attack Damage: +#indieBDR%, Attack speed increased by 1, Enemy DEF ignored: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%, summons Moonbeam spirit guardian
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec
Liver Memory Chance (on attack): #prop%, Spirit Bond Max Duration: +#x sec, doesn't increase past the Spirit Bond Max cooldown.
The summoned Spirit Guardian uses the below skills on its own:
#cLiver Circle Dance#: Attacks up to 6 enemies with 275% damage 3 times, Cooldown: 3 sec
#cSpirit Frenzy#: Attacks up to 10 enemies with 150% damage, Duration: 4.8 sec, Shade's Spirit Frenzy Final Damage (while Spirit Guardian is using Spirit Frenzy): +#y%, Cooldown: 30 sec
#cSpirit Ward#: Uses Spirit Frenzy regardless of Shade's current Spirit Frenzy cooldown as long as Shade doesn't have Spirit Frenzy active, Cooldown: 100 sec#

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, Max HP, and Max MP. Reduces the amount of MP used when using skills. Can be stacked with other buff skills except for Advanced Blessing.

string.value: MP Cost: 120, For 240 seconds - Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Weapon DEF +425, Magic DEF +425, Accuracy +260, Avoidability +260, Max HP +475, Max MP +475, MP Consumption: -12%

string.value: Decent Speed Infusion

string.name: desc

string.name: h1

string.value: After taking out #x enemies, deals damage to #mobCount enemies at the next attack. Damage: #w + #z% per your level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Your level affects only up to Lv. 180. If you attack a boss #y times, it will count as taking out 1 enemy. Once activated, it won't activate again until after #time sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Make a pact with a dark spirit using a black magic book. The dark spirit follows you around and when you collect a certain amount of souls, they will reveal themselves to deal a wide-range attack. Its attack will ignore attack reflection and has Attack Power proportional to its level.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off

string.name: name
string.value: Hasty Aura

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a bright yellow aura that increases the Speed and Attack Speed of your party members. Cancel the aura by pressing the skill key again. Will be canceled if you use another type of aura. Also, permanently increases your Speed, Max Speed, Jump, Attack Speed, and Avoidability.

string.name: h

Use it once more or another aura to deactivate. Also allows you to use enemy souls to recover some of your Max HP.

string.value: Dark Genesis

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Uses the power of darkness to attack and possibly stun up to 15 enemies at once. If you've learned Dark Shock, that skill's damage will also permanently increase.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses deadly lightning to hit and temporarily stun a maximum of 15 enemies. Dark Genesis ignores attack reflection. Learning Dark Genesis skill will permanently increase damage on Dark Chain, Battle Burst, and Dark Shock, and attacking an enemy during cooldown will deal damage with a lightning attack to a single enemy.

string.value: Increases damage relative to the number of summoned robots, and increases the Attack Power, self-destruction damage, and summon duration of all summoned robots. <Rock 'n Shock> and <Open Portal GX-9> must have all of their units summoned to be counted as a single unit, and toy robots are not affected. Also increases the damage of <Robo Launcher RM7>.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage increased by #w% per summoned Robot, damage increase is additive.\nRobot's final damage and final self-destruction damage: +#x%, summon duration: +#y%.\n<Robo Launcher RM7> damage: +#damR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Robot SG-88

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Summons giant robot SG-88 to attack all nearby enemies. An activation gauge pops up when this robot is summoned, and damage can be charged and amplified (up to two times the base amount) by hitting the regular attack key.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the giant robot SG-88 to bombard a group of enemies with missiles. An activation gauge pops up when this robot is summoned, and damage can be charged and amplified (up to double the base amount) by hitting the regular attack key. Decreases damage taken upon use.

string.name: name
string.value: Mech: Missile Tank

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates Missile Tank mode during which your mech continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Siege Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. All attacks become critical hits.
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key. 
[To shoot: [#cAttack key#]
[Skills that can be used: #cLaser Blast, Siege Mode#]
Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Tank Mode MP Cost: #mpCon plus #u MP every #v sec, Damage: #damage% \nBasic Attack Critical Rate: +#cr%, MP Cost: #w, Damage Bonus (Siege mode): +#z%, All attacks become critical hits.

string.name: pdesc
string.value:
Activates Missile Tank mode during which your mech continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Siege Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. 
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key. 
[To shoot: [#cAttack key#]
[Skills that can be used: #cLaser Blast, Siege Mode#]
Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.name: ph
string.value: Tank Mode MP Cost: #mpCon plus #u MP every #v sec, Damage: #damage% \nBasic Attack Critical Rate: +#cr%, MP Cost: #w, Damage Bonus (Siege mode): +#z%, All attacks become critical hits.

string.name: name
string.value: Satellite Safety

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Satellite attack damage. When you take a fatal blow, a Satellite can minimize the damage you take by absorbing some of the damage. The Satellite will then disappear and the skill will be on cooldown. \nToggle this skill #cOn/Off# by pressing the skill key.\nRequired Skill: #cSatellite Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Satellite Attack Damage: +#damR% \nProcs when you take damage more than #x% of your Max HP, Absorbs #y% of the damage received, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc

string.name: ph
string.value: Absorbs #y% of damage greater than #x% of your MaxHP\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.value: Bots 'n Tots

string.name: desc
string.value: Places a robot factory that summons toy robots. Summoned robots detect nearby enemies and self-destruct on them. The factory itself also self-destructs after a certain period of time. The factory does not take damage even when attacking enemies with attack reflection.

string.value: Full Spread

string.name: desc
string.value: Diverts power to the Homing Beacon rotation systems, but decreases Damage.

string.name: bookName
string.value: Blaster Basics

string.name: name
string.value: Magnum Punch

string.name: desc
string.value: With the explosive power of the Arm Cannon, unleash a powerful straight punch in front of you. You can use Revolving Cannon while using this skill. You can link this skill to Double Blast.\n#cLv. 20 required to learn 'Bobbing'#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nUsing Revolving Cannon while using Magnum Punch will additionally attack the same number of enemies for #y% damage #x times.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolving Cannon

string.name: desc
string.value: Use your Arm Cannon to create additional explosions and deal damage. This cannot be used as a standalone skill. It can only be used during certain attacks. Holding the key down will manually reload your Ammo.\n#cSkills during which Revolving Cannon can be used: Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Revolving Blast#

string.name: h
string.value: Uses 1 Ammo, and your Ammo is reloaded if used as a key-down skill

string.name: name
string.value: Bunker Buster Explosion

string.name: desc
string.value:
Depletes the Dynamo Gauge to release massive explosions and shockwaves. Ignores Defense Rate of enemies' in melee range.
The Dynamo Gauge charges when using Revolving Cannon during certain offensive skills. Additional shockwaves are released based on Dynamo Gauge bars used, dealing extra damage based on proximity. Immune to damage from attack reflection.
Required skill: #cRevolving Cannon Mastery Lv.5#
#cLv. 10 required to learn 'Revolving Blast'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Requires #x or more Dynamo Gauge bars. Attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times. Melee hits ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemies' Defense Rate. #cMax damage #MDamageOver.#\nReleases Shockwave 1 attacking up to #q enemies for #w% damage #w2 times.\n#cAfter use, Overheats for #time sec, during which the Dynamo Gauge is set to max and Bunker Buster Explosion is disabled.# On ending, depletes the Dynamo Gauge.

string.name: name
string.value: Double Jump

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to double jump.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, jumps further

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire your cannon to thrust in the direction opposite the way you are facing. The recoil that thrusts you will also damage nearby enemies. Using the skill while holding the up arrow key will cause an explosion on the ground that propels you upward. Attacking an enemy with attack reflection will not damage you, and the skill cannot be used while reloading.

string.name: h
string.value: Ammo Cost: 1, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: name
string.value: Blast Shield

string.name: desc
string.value: When attacked by an enemy, generates a protective shield proportional to the damage taken. Also, while using a Blaster skill, you won't be knocked back even when you are attacked.

string.name: h
string.value: When hit, convert #x% of your damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\n100% chance of not being knocked back while using a Blaster skill.\nPermanently increases Power Stance Chance by #stanceProp%, Weapon DEF by #pddX, and Max HP by #mhpR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolving Cannon Mastery

string.name: desc
string.value: Study the Arm Cannon to learn the basics of Revolving Cannon. Any enemies attacked directly by an overheated Arm Cannon will receive additional damage due to the excess heat, and the additional damage increases depending on your number of charged Dynamo Gauge stock.\n#cAffected skills: Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, Ballistic Hurricane, Muzzle Flash, Hyper Magnum Punch#\n#cLv. 5 required to learn the 2nd Job skill 'Revolving Cannon Upgrade'.#

string.name: h
string.value: When the Dynamo Gauge has at least 1 stock, direct attacks from the Arm Cannon will trigger additional attacks which deal #damage% #attackCount times. For each charged Dynamo Gauge stock, the damage of the additional hits increase by #x%.\nPermanently increases Movement Speed by #psdSpeed, Jump Power by #psdJump, and Max Movement Speed by #speedMax.

string.value: Bunker Buster Explosion

string.value: Blaster Skills

string.name: name
string.value: Double Blast

string.name: desc
string.value: Using the momentum from your Arm Cannon, perform a powerful 2-hit combo in the direction you're facing. After you learn the skill, you can also activate it by repeatedly pressing the Magnum Punch button. You can use Revolving Cannon while using this skill. Can be linked to Bobbing, Weaving, Hammer Smash, or Shotgun Punch.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nUsing Revolving Cannon while using Double Blast will additionally attack the same number of enemies for #y% damage #x times.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Move forward while avoiding enemy attacks. Avoidability increases during this skill, and you can stop it immediately by jumping. Can be linked to Magnum Punch or Rocket Rush.
If activated after a charge, #cany skill that was already activated will be canceled, and Bobbing will be activated. #You can charge a skill while using a different skill, and up to 2 skills can be charged simultaneously.
Additionally, permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.
Required skill:#cMagnum Punch Lv. 20#
#cLv. 15 required to learn 'Weaving'.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP cost: #mpCon, Avoidability +#w% for 1.5 sec after activation.\nMagnum Punch damage +#damPlus% points.

string.name: name
string.value: Arm Cannon Boost

string.name: desc
string.value: Doubles the attack speed of your weapon. Must have an Arm Cannon equipped. \nRequired Skill: #cArm Cannon Mastery Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Weapon Attack Speed: +2

string.name: name
string.value: Arm Cannon Mastery

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Arm Cannon weapon mastery, Critical Rate, and Attack Power.\n#cLv. 10 required to learn 'Gauntlet Expert'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Mastery +#mastery%, Critical Rate +#cr%, and Attack Power +#padX

string.value: Physical Training

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases STR and DEX through sheer physical training.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increase STR by #strX and DEX by #dexX.

string.name: name
string.value: Charge Mastery

string.name: desc
string.value: Maintain control over your power to improve charge skills. Additionally, permanently increases Damage.\n#cLv. 14 required to learn 'Advanced Charge Mastery'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by #x%. Using a charge skill reloads your #w Ammo immediately but will not interrupt an auto-reload.\nImmediately after using charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by #y%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Damage by #damR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolving Cannon Plus

string.name: desc
string.value: Improves the potential for the Revolving Cannon embedded within your Arm Cannon.\nRequired skill: #cRevolving Cannon Mastery Lv. 5#\n#cLv. 20 required to learn 'Revolving Cannon Plus II'.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 damage +#w2% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +#s% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +#s2% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 4 bars, maximum number of Ammo increased to 4.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 4 bars or higher increases damage by 40% points and will generate Shockwave 2, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolving Cannon

string.value: Bunker Buster Explosion

string.name: bookName
string.value: Advanced Blaster Skills

string.name: name
string.value: Hammer Smash

string.name: desc
string.value: Strike the ground to knock nearby enemies into the air. Affected enemies receive a debuff increasing the final damage taken for a period of time.Charge the skill by holding down the key. #cWhile charging, attacks won't knock you back. Releasing the charge will cancel any active skills, and will create an extra shockwave that deals additional attacks.# You can charge skills even while other skills are in use, and up to 2 skills may be charged at once. You will not take damage from shockwaves that strike enemies with attack reflection.\nPermanently increases Double Blast damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Number of Enemies: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%. Attacks #attackCount times. Applies Debuff on hit: for #y seconds, Final Damage taken +#x%.\nWhen releasing charge, creates a shockwave that lasts for #q sec and hits up to #s enemies for #q2% damage #s2 times. Enemies struck by the shockwave will be afflicted by the Final Damage debuff.\nDouble Blast Damage +#damPlus% points.

string.name: name
string.value: Hammer Smash

string.name: name
string.value: Hammer Smash

string.name: desc
string.value:
Move backward while avoiding enemy attacks. Avoidability increases during this skill, and you can stop it immediately by jumping. Can be linked to Rocket Rush or Muzzle Flash.
If activated after a charge, #cany skill that was already activated will be canceled, and Weaving will be activated.# You can charge a skill while using a different skill, and up to 2 skills can be charged simultaneously. Additionally, permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.
Required skill: #cBobbing Lv. 15#
#cLv. 15 required to learn 'Muzzle Flash'.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP cost: #mpCon, Avoidability +#w% for 1.5 sec after activation.\nMagnum Punch damage +#damPlus% points.

string.name: name
string.value: Rocket Rush

string.name: desc
string.value: Grab onto nearby enemies and drag them in the direction you're facing. Any enemy in your path will be bulldozed along, and you can use Magnum Launch during this skill. This skill will not be activated if there are no enemies nearby to grab. \nRequired Skill: #cWeaving Lv. 1#

string.name: h
string.value: MP cost: #mpCon, grab onto a maximum of #mobCount enemies and deal #damage% Damage #attackCount times. After the grab, push back up to #q nearby enemies while dealing #q2% damge.

string.name: name
string.value: Magnum Launch

string.name: desc
string.value: Deliver a powerful punch to the enemy you were holding with Rocket Rush. The enemy will be launched a certain distance and explode, damaging any other enemies it hits on the way. Can only use during Rocket Rush, and using Rocket Rush again will activate this skill.\nRequired skill : #cRocket Rush Lv. 1#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Revolving Cannon Plus II

string.name: desc
string.value: Improves the potential for the Revolving Cannon embedded within your Arm Cannon. This overwrites the increases from Revolving Cannon Plus.\n#cLv. 20 required to learn 'Revolving Cannon Plus III'.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 and 2 damage +#w2%
Additional attack damage due to overheating +#s% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +#s2% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +#v% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 5 bars, maximum number of Ammo increased to 5.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 5 bars or higher increases damage by 80% points and will generate Shockwave 3, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

string.name: name
string.value: Shield Training

string.name: desc
string.value: Fortify your Blast Shield with some training. \nRequired Skill: #cBlast Shield Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: When hit, convert #x% of your damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #asrR% and all Elemental Resistance by #terR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Combo Training

string.name: desc
string.value: Research the most efficient movement and attack patterns for battle. Using linked skills or charge skills will increase your abilities. Additionally, Attack Power is permanently increased.\n#cLv. 9 required to learn 'Combo Training II'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Can be stacked up to #x times. Duration: #time sec. Final Damage increased by #y% per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every #w stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every #z stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by #padR%

string.value: Bunker Buster Explosion

string.value: Shotgun Punch

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire a hard-hitting shot that's accompanied by a shockwave. For a short time after, a spiraling shockwave will remain in that spot, dealing additional damage. Additionally, permanently increases Double Blast damage.

string.name: name
string.value: Shotgun Punch

string.name: name
string.value: Muzzle Flash

string.name: desc
string.value: Instantly approach a nearby enemy while Weaving to perform an attack. Can only be used during Weaving, and can be activated by Weaving again. It will not be activated if there is no enemy within range. Can be linked to Magnum Punch, and permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.\nRequired skill : #cWeaving Lv. 15#

string.name: h
string.value: MP cost: #mpCon, Maximum Number of Enemies: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nMagnum Punch damage +#damPlus% points

string.name: name
string.value: Ballistic Hurricane

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash all of your fighting prowess into a seamless cyclone of punches. Your rapid onslaught of punches create a hurricane and pulls in nearby enemies. You can continue to move and attack while the skill is active. Additionally, permanently increases Hammer Smash damage.\nRequired skill: #cWeaving Lv. 15#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost #mpCon, Maxinum Number of Enemies: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Duration: #time sec. After the skill, deliver a jumping uppercut that attacks up to #z enemies for #s% damage and sends them flying. The jumping uppercut has a #cMax Damage of #dot#.
You can #cmove around# using the #carrow keys# while holding the skill key down.
Hammer Smash Damage +#damPlus% points
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Revolving Blast

string.name: desc
string.value: Reloads Ammo. Rush, grab and stun an enemy you're facing. Prioritizes highest Max HP target in range. Revolving Cannon is usable while holding enemy. Use Revolving Cannon on the enemy 6 times and perform this skill again to unleash a Bunker Buster for extra damage. Activates even when grabbing an enemy that can't be stunned. Invincible while holding the enemy. Bonus Bunker Buster attack ignores additional Defense Rate. Will not activate if no enemies are nearby. \nAffected enemy is immune to Stun for 60 seconds.\nRequired skill: #cBunker Buster Explosion Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Rush and grab enemy for #damage% damage. Stuns. Hits #attackCount times. Activate Revolving Cannon to attack up to more #s enemies up to 6 times. Each attack hits #s2 time(s) for #x%, #y%, #t%, #w2%, #q%, or #q2% damage.\nBonus Bunker Buster deals #z% damage #v times and ignores additional #ignoreMobpdpR% Defense Rate. #cMax Damage: #dot# \tCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Vitality Shield

string.name: desc
string.value: Converts an active Blast Shield to HP. You can't use this if no Blast Shield is active or if your HP is full. There is a brief moment after using this skill where damage from attacks, including attacks that deal a percentage of your HP, is reduced. The damage reduction is determined by the damage reduction of Charge Mastery. This buff is not affected by buff duration extension effects. Additionally, permanently increases Magnum Launch damage.\nRequired skill : #cShield Training II Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, recovers HP equal to the sum of the dissipated Blast Shield and #x% of your Max HP. The extended defense period lasts for #time sec.\nMagnum Launch damage increased by #damPlus% points.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

Using a charge skill reloads your #w Ammo immediately but will not interrupt an auto-reload.\nImmediately after using charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by #y%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemies' Defense Rate, and damage taken is reduced by #damAbsorbShieldR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Hyper Magnum Punch

string.name: desc
string.value:
Concentrate your power and charge forward, unleashing a devastating punch that causes colossal explosions.
You can charge the skill by holding down the key. Additional shockwaves are generated depending on how long you spend charging, dealing more damage to nearby enemies. While charging, you will have improved defenses, your Abnormal Status resistance increases, and you will not be pushed back by any attack. 
The final damage increases depending on the number of times you get attacked while charging.
Hyper Magnum Punch's charge time is not affected by charge time reduction effect of Charge Mastery. If there is no enemy in range after the initial charge, neither the attack nor the shockwave will occur.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% #attackCount times. #cMax Damage: #MDamageOver#.
Generates a shockwave that attacks for #v% damage #v2 times.
Can be enhanced up to #z levels by charging, and each level of enhancement generates an additional shockwave that deals #q%, #q2%, #s2% damage #dot times.
While charging, the defense boosts from Charge Mastery are applied, and Abnormal Status Resistance increases by 100%.
Each time you get hit while charging, the final damage increases by #x%, up to #y%.
Can be charged for up to #subTime sec.
Cooldown : #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Royal Guard

string.name: desc
string.value: Soul Shield nullifies enemy attack and counterattacks.\n#cCan guard while using this skill.#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Become invincible when attacked for #dot sec nullifying attacks and counterattacking #cfor a set time after use#. Counterattack will even damage enemies with Attack Ignore or Attack Reflect effects. Attack Power increases for #x sec a counterattack.
If you guard successfully #cwhile in Attack Power Increase buff state#, counterattack damage, attack range, and Attack Power increases gradually but #cthe time for guarding decreases gradually.#
Attack Power stacks when guarding consecutively. Chance of activating Final Attack on use.
[1st Time]: Max Number of Enemies: #hcSummonHp, Damage: #hcCooltime% + #z% per level, Number of Attacks: #hcReflect, Attack Power: +#dotTime.
[2nd Time]: Max Number of Enemies: #u, Damage: #w% + #t% per level, Number of Attacks: #u2, Attack Power: +#dotInterval.
[3rd Time]: Max Number of Enemies: #v, Damage: #s% + #s2% per level, Number of Attacks: #v2, Attack Power: +#range.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Ring of Restraint

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your Attack Power and Magic Attack temporarily for a set time. However, your movement will be restricted while the skill lasts.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic Attack: +#indieMadR%. Movement restricted when the skill's in effect. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Ultimatum Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Fixes the player's max ATT at 2,000,000 temporarily.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. The player's Max ATT is fixed at #x. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Limit Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily fixes max MP at 500 to increase damage against Boss Monsters.\n#c[Cannot be used by classes that do not use MP.]#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Fixed Max MP: #x MP, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Health Cut Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily decreases max HP to increase damage against Boss Monsters.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: -#x, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Mana Cut Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Decreases the max MP and ignores a certain percentage of the Defense Rate temporarily.\n#c[Cannot be used by the classes that do not use MP.]#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max MP: -#x%, Ignore DEF: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Durability Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily doubles your Max HP.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: +#indieMhpR%, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Max Critical Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases the max Critical Damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Critical Damage: +#x%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Critical Defense Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily nullifies the enemy's Defense Rate as much as a certain percentage of your Critical Chance.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Ignored enemy DEF increases as much as #x% of your Critical Chance. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Critical Shift Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily replaces the Critical Chance with some values of the main stats in which AP was directly invested.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, replaces Critical Chance with #x% value of the main stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (The Critical Chance might go lower when using the skill.)

string.name: name
string.value: Stance Shift Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily replaces Power Stance with some values of the main stats in which AP was directly invested.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, replaces Power Stance with #x% value of the main stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (Power Stance might decrease when using the skill.)

string.name: name
string.value: Totalling Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases your main stats by the sum of all stats.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases the main stats by #x% of the sum of all the stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Level Jump S Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases STR by the character's current level temporarily.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases STR by #x% of the current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Level Jump D Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases DEX by the character's current level temporarily.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of the current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Level Jump I Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases INT by the character's current level temporarily.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Level Jump L Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases LUK by the character's current level temporarily.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of the current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Jump S Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases STR by a portion of the main weapon's default ATT.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases STR by #x% of the equipped main weapon's default Attack Power. (Out of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Jump D Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases DEX by a portion of the main weapon's default ATT.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of the equipped main weapon's default Attack Power. (Out of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Jump I Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases INT by a portion of the main weapon's default ATT.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the equipped main weapon's default Attack Power. (Out of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Jump L Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases LUK by a portion of the main weapon's default ATT.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of the equipped main weapon's default Attack Power. (Out of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Swift Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases attack speed.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases Attack Speed by #indieBooster level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Overdrive Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to temporarily deal damage to enemies even when they are under Attack Ignore and attack reflection. Also increases your damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, ignores enemy Attack Ignore and attack reflection effects. Does 100% damage. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Berserker Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Ignores a percentage of enemy Defense Rate but also decreases your Weapon Defense and Magic Defense temporarily during attacks.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Ignore Enemy DEF: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%, Weapon Defense: -#indiePddR%, Magic Defense: -#indieMddR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Reflective Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Amplifies the incoming damage by a certain amount and reflects it for a limited period of time.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Amplifies the incoming damage by #x% and reflects. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Cleansing Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Cancels all Abnormal Statuses at a set chance.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Cancels all the Abnormal Statuses at the #prop% rate. Can be used even when Abnormal Status isn't in effect but its benefits won't be applied. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Risk Taker Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases Attack Power and Magic Attack by a set amount. Buffs will be canceled if you take damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic Attack: +#indieMadR%, Buffs canceled when you take damage, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nA force of darkness woke up the Dragon Knight! Transform into a Dragon Knight and ride a Black Dragon to move #cvery quickly#. #cDouble-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nMount a Shining Balloon that can use the High Altitude Flight skill in a town to move #cextremely quickly#. #cDouble-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.) Press the #cJump# key on #cStar Planet#n to activate the booster function.

(Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: name
string.value: Blessing of the Fairy

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: name
string.value: Empress's Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Decent Advanced Blessing

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic Attack, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, Max HP, and Max MP. Reduces the amount of MP consumed when using skills. Can be stacked with other buff skills except Advanced Blessing.

string.value: MP Cost: 120, For 240 seconds - Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Weapon DEF +425, Magic DEF +425, Accuracy +260, Avoidability +260, Max HP +475, Max MP +475, MP Consumption: -12%

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Powerhouse

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean realized using tools can be fun! Keep tapping the attack key to deal 4 consecutive attacks with lots of tools and move forward.\nIncreases damage for other skills after use. Can be linked to other skills.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all hits#: MP Cost per attack: #mpCon, Skill Damage Increase buff once to skill other than Pink Bean Attack will disappear after use or after #time sec
#c1st hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Final Damage of next skill: +#x%
#c2nd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #s, Final Damage of next skill: +#q% 
#c3rd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #v2, Damage: #s2% + #u2% per level, Number of Attacks: +#w2, Final Damage of next skill:+ #q2%
#c4th hit#: Required Level: 60, Max Enemies Hit: #speedMax, Damage: #psdJump% + #psdSpeed% per level, Number of Attacks: #dotInterval, Final Damage of next skill: +#dotTime%

string.name: name
string.value: Let's Roll!

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean realized rolling around is way faster than walking. Can be used on the ground and in the air. It even changes depending on where it is used. Not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: #cOn Ground#: MP Cost: #mpCon per sec. While the skill is on keydown, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #w% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount while moving. After a set time, size gets bigger, Damage: #z% + #s% per level, Max Keydown Time: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec\n#cIn Air#: MP Cost: #v, Jump once more during a jump to use it and rolls forward in the air to attack, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #y% + 1% for every #u level(s), Number of Attacks: #q2, Cooldown: 0.5 sec

string.name: name
string.value: Let's Roll!

string.name: name
string.value: Let's Roll!

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean lands from the air more slowly than usual. It reminds you of something...

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Falling Speed during Keydown: #x, Can only be used in the air.

string.name: name
string.value: Chill Out

string.name: desc
string.value: When Pink Bean is tired from exploring Maple World, he has many cool ways to relax. This skill produces different effects depending on the action. Not affected by buff duration increase or buff removal.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all methods#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime, Invincible after use for +#x sec, EXP obtained: +#y%, Cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.
#cTongue Out#: Max Enemies Hit: #z, Enemy DEF: -#s%
#cNom Nom Meat#: Recovers #w% of your Max HP per sec
#cZzz#: ATT: +#u%
#cMysterious Cocktail#: Abnormal Status Resistance: +#v%
#cPink Bean Headset#: ATT: +#s2%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +#w2%

string.name: name
string.value: Tongue Out!

string.name: desc
string.value: Nya, nya, gettin' all the goods! Grants you bonus EXP and reduces nearby monster Defense. Unaffected by buff duration increase and buff removal.

string.name: h
string.value: Invincible for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Reduces DEF of up to #mobCount enemy(ies) by #z%

string.name: name
string.value: Nom Nom Meat

string.name: desc
string.value: This meat sure is easy on the stomach! Grants more EXP and gradually recovers HP. Unaffected by buff duration increase and buff removal.

string.name: h
string.value: Invincible for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Recovers #dotHealHPPerSecondR% of your Max HP per sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Feelin' fresh after that power nap! Grants more EXP and increases ATT. Unaffected by buff duration increase and buff removal.

string.name: h
string.value: Invincible for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Increases ATT by #indiePadR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Mysterious Cocktail

string.name: desc
string.value: Cold and refreshing! Grants more EXP and increases Abnormal Status Resistance. Unaffected by buff duration increase and buff removal.

string.name: h
string.value: Invincible for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #indieAsrR%

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean's Headset

string.name: desc
string.value: Music is my life! Grants more EXP, increases ATT and Abnormal Status Resistance, and gradually recovers HP. Unaffected by buff duration increase and buff removal.

string.name: h
string.value: Invincible for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Increases ATT by #indiePadR, Increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #indieAsrR%

string.name: name
string.value: Instant Garden

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves growing monstrous plants, and this is a perfect spot for one! The plant's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cPosie#: Max Enemies Hit: #y, Damage: #x% + #u% per level, Duration: #v sec
#cBreezy#: Max Enemies Hit: #psdSpeed, Damage: #z% + #q% per level, Number of Attacks: #w
#cPretty#: Duration: #s sec, Seduces to decrease DEF by #s2%, Speed by #psdJump

string.name: name
string.value: Sky Jump

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves soaring through the skies of Maple World! Not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Duration for charging: #time sec and the more you charge, the further you can jump. Max distance when you charge #dotTime sec 
You can use direction keys during jump to adjust the distance. When you hit an enemy, attacks Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #w% per level and jumps again. Can jump again #z time(s). Boss Damage: +#bdR% 
Can be used in the air, but will drop you to the ground immediately.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Mid-air Sky Jump

string.name: name
string.value: Sky Jump Grounder

string.name: name
string.value: Everybody Happy!

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean cheers up the whole party with a special brand of adorableness! Boosts Party EXP, Speed, Attack Power, and Magic Attack Power. Unaffected by buff duration increase and buff removal.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon,Invincible after use for #y sec, Cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nDuration: #time sec, All party member EXP: +#indieExp%, Speed: +#indieSpeed, ATT/Magic AT: +#indiePadR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Blazing Yo-yo

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is one of the finest yo-yo-ers of this generation! Watch this burning trick that clobbers enemies multiple times. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: You can get up to #x yo-yo(s) every #s sec, and they are used when you use the skill.\n#c1 hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #z% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Can be used consecutively as a 2-hit attack.\n#c2nd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #w% + #u% per level, Number of Attacks: #q2. Use the skill consecutively to link as one hit.

string.name: name
string.value: Blazing Yo-yo

string.name: name
string.value: Blazing Yo-yo

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Pulverizer

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's love for all things pink can be... dangerous. This knocks over a pink pillar to deal heavy damage. During cooldown, there's a chance for Mini Beans to come to your aid, and every time they attack it lowers the cooldown on this skill. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #z% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Chance to summon Mini Beans during cooldown: +#y%
Each time Mini Beans attack, cooldown decreases by #x sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Pulverizer Damage

string.name: name
string.value: Let's Rock!

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is a huge music buff, and has no qualms about busting out with his instruments. Each instrument has its own special effect.

string.name: h

string.value:
Lift monsters or objects with even stronger powers of psychokinesis. The following actions can be done while holding.#c
\c
\c[Psychic Smash]:# Using [Psychic Grab] with monster lifted will throw that monster at enemies in front of you, dealing damage.
\c
\c#c[Ultimate - Psychic Shot]:# Pressing the up key and [Psychic Grab] with monster lifted will throw the monster in the direction it is facing.

string.name: name
string.value: バルログのヘルファイヤー

string.name: desc
string.value: バルログの魂を召還し画面の中の多数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。nダメージ2500%で15匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+20%、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: バルログの魂を召還し画面の中の多数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。

string.name: name
string.value: ホーンテイルのファイヤーブレス

string.name: desc
string.value: ホーンテイルの魂を召還し左右の複数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。 対象は一定時間の間持続的に火炎ダメージを受ける。nダメージ3500%で15匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+20%、10秒の間、持続ダメージ秒当たり、300%、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ホーンテイルの魂を召還し左右の複数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。 対象は一定時間の間持続的に火炎ダメージを受ける。

string.name: name
string.value: レックスの突撃

string.name: desc
string.value: レックスの魂を召還し前方の複数の敵を一気に即死させる。ボスモンスターには一般ダメージが適用される。n一般モンスター即死、ボスモンスターダメージ1500%、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: レックスの魂を召還し前方の複数の敵を一気に即死させる。ボスモンスターには一般ダメージが適用される。

string.name: name
string.value: アニのジャッジメント

string.name: desc
string.value: アニの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力なハンマー攻撃をする。nダメージ4000%で1匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+40%、相手防御力を無視、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: アニの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力なハンマー攻撃をする。

string.name: name
string.value: ドラゴンライダーのエネルギーブレス

string.name: desc
string.value: ドラゴンライダーの魂を召還し前方の複数の敵に強力なエネルギー攻撃をする。対象は一定時間の間持続的に被害を受ける。nダメージ3000%で15匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+40%、10秒の間持続ダメージ300%、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ドラゴンライダーの魂を召還し前方の複数の敵に強力なエネルギー攻撃をする。対象は一定時間の間持続的に被害を受ける。

string.name: name
string.value: ヴァンレオンのライオンスラッシュ

string.name: desc
string.value: ヴァンレオンの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力な一撃を与える。nダメージ5000%で1匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+30%、相手防御力を無視、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ヴァンレオンの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力な一撃を与える。

string.name: name
string.value: ジャクムのバーニングタワー

string.name: desc
string.value: ジャクムの魂を召還し左右の複数の敵を燃え上がるタワーで攻撃する。相手は一定時間の間持続的に火炎被害を受ける。

string.name: h1
string.value: ヴァンレオンの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力な一撃を与える。

string.name: name
string.value: ジェラシーロッカーのデスピッキング

string.name: desc
string.value: ジェラシーロッカーの魂を召還する。召還したジェラシーロッカー2分程現れ周りの複数の敵にスターン攻撃をする。nダメージ500%で15匹にスターン攻撃、持続時間2分、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ジェラシーロッカーの魂を召還する。召還したジェラシーロッカー2分程現れ周りの複数の敵にスターン攻撃をする。

string.name: name
string.value: 武公の絶対攻撃

string.name: desc
string.value: 武公の魂から強力な力を受け取って30秒間普段の2倍のダメージを与える。nダメージ2倍増加、持続時間1分、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: 武公の魂から強力な力を受け取って30秒間普段の2倍のダメージを与える。

string.name: name
string.value: ピンクビーンの来るな！

string.name: desc
string.value: ピンクビーンの魂を召還する。召還したピンクビーンは２分程現れ周りの複数の敵に強力な攻撃をする。nダメージ1500%で15匹攻撃、持続時間1分、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ピンクビーンの魂を召還する。召還したピンクビーンは２分程現れ周りの複数の敵に強力な攻撃をする。

string.name: name
string.value: 女王の爆風

string.name: desc
string.value: 爆風のようなシグナスの威力を感じられる。魂の武器の力で召喚されたシグナスが周辺のモンスターに嵐のような攻撃を開始する。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒間、攻撃力#damage%のシグナス召喚\n再使用待機時間 #cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: クセルクセスのヤギ隊

string.name: desc
string.value: クセルクセスのヤギ隊が突進する。魂の武器の力で召喚されたクセルクセスがヤギ隊と前方を攻撃する。

string.name: h
string.value: 最大#mobCount体の敵を#damage%ダメージで#attackCount回攻撃\n再使用待機時間 #cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: エピネアの香り

string.name: desc
string.value: エピネアが立ち去った場所には香りが漂っている。魂の武器の力で召喚されたエピネアの力でグループ員のHP/MPが上昇する。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒間、グループ員のHP/MP 50%増加\n再使用待機時間 #cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: アカイラムのコブラ

string.name: desc
string.value: アカイラムのコブラは周りのものを全て硬直させるほどの威力がある。魂の武器の力で召喚されたアカイラムが強い眼差しで周辺のモンスターにスタンダメージを与える。

string.name: h
string.value: 最大#mobCount体の敵を#damage% ダメージで#attackCount回攻撃、被害を受けた対象は#time秒間気絶\n再使用待機時間#cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: 恐怖咆哮

string.name: desc
string.value: 巨大的海中王族，額頭上有著恐怖的疤痕。被靈魂武器力量召喚的海怒斯以兇暴的咆哮對周圍的怪物造成緩慢効果。

string.name: h
string.value: 對周圍的怪物造成#prob%的緩慢効果\n冷卻時間：#cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: 霹靂雷鳴

string.name: desc
string.value: 美艷的希拉將召喚閃電。被靈魂武器力量召喚的希拉向四面八方發動閃電雷擊，使周圍的怪物受到傷害。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒內召喚攻擊力#damage%的希拉\n冷卻時間：#cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: 粉紅毒霧

string.name: desc
string.value: 大章魚噴吐毒霧。被靈魂武器力量召喚的船長黑綠水靈噴吐毒霧，使周圍的怪物受到毒氣傷害。

string.name: h
string.value: 對最多#mobCount個敵人造成#attackCount次#damage%傷害的攻擊，#dotTime秒內每#dotInterval秒持續受到#dot%的傷害\n冷卻時間：#cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: 逆襲黑龍

string.name: desc
string.value: 召喚背叛者梅格耐斯一同作戰。（小心他隨時都會背叛…）被靈魂武器力量召喚的梅格耐斯在一定時間內會攻擊周圍的怪物。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒內召喚攻擊力#damage%的梅格耐斯\n冷卻時間#cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: Battoujutsu Advance

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Time Limit: #time sec. Attack Power based on stage of attack: +#damR%

string.name: desc
string.value:
Unleashes back-to-back Battoujutsu attacks as quick as the wind. Uses all 8 stages of attack during the time limit. 
1st Attack: Surging Blade
2nd Attack: Shouryuusen
3rd Attack: Slash Up
4th Attack: Falcon Dive
5th Attack: Dankuusen
6th Attack: Sweeping Sword
7th Attack: Tornado Blade 
Final Attack: Sudden Strike
Attacks activated during the time limit will have increased Attack Power based on the stage. #cOnly learned skills will activate.#

Required Skill: Lv. 20 Dragon Dive#
